mapper.insert: insert into CUSTOMER (STATE, CNAME, EMPLOYEE_CODE, EMPLOYEE_NAME, EMPLOYEE_RANK, ADRESS_NUMBER, ADRESS_DORO, ADRESS_JIBEON, ADRESS_DETAIL, ADRESS_MEMO, TEL, MEMO, BALANCE) values (#{STATE},#{CNAME},#{EMPLOYEE_CODE},#{EMPLOYEE_NAME},#{EMPLOYEE_RANK},#{ADRESS_NUMBER},#{ADRESS_DORO},#{ADRESS_JIBEON},#{ADRESS_DETAIL},#{ADRESS_MEMO},#{TEL},#{MEMO},#{BALANCE})
mapper.update: update CUSTOMER set STATE=#{STATE}, CNAME=#{CNAME}, EMPLOYEE_CODE=#{EMPLOYEE_CODE}, EMPLOYEE_NAME=#{EMPLOYEE_NAME}, ADRESS_NUMBER=#{ADRESS_NUMBER}, ADRESS_DORO=#{ADRESS_DORO}, ADRESS_JIBEON=#{ADRESS_JIBEON}, ADRESS_DETAIL=#{ADRESS_DETAIL}, ADRESS_MEMO=#{ADRESS_MEMO}, TEL=#{TEL}, MEMO=#{MEMO}, BALANCE=#{BALANCE} where CCODE = #{CCODE}
